title: I still can't save my replays
body:
I did this question a while ago and i got a response, i tried it but it didnt work.
Can someone help me, because i already do the repair thing and is the same...

replies.body: Are you trying to save *Replays* or *Highlights?* Also, what do you specifically experience when trying to do so?

when i try to save my replays from my match history it starts downloading but then it says that there was an error. 
i can save highlights from spectate mode.
Can you screenshot the specific error so I can look into this further?
This happens with every replay in your match history, regardless of game mode?
I have only tried in normal games, but in different games.

Gotcha. Since this happens with multiple replays, I suspect this is caused by a *poor connection* to the servers that hold these matches. I'd like you to work through our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure you haven't configured your network with settings that conflict with League.

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue.
